name: Disrupt!
description:
Disrupt! is a game made for the November 2021 GitHub Game Off. In the game, your job is use bugs to disrupt the supply chain to prevent packages from being delivered to houses.

Delivery vans appear with each wave, and have a limited amount of time to deliver the 5 packages in their payload. For each package they are unable to deliver, you gain Disruption Power. Spend your Disruption Power to affect the vans on the screen:

  •  Navigation Bug: Causes vans to lose their destination and not deliver packages while active. A navigation bug lasts 5 seconds.
  • Red Light Hack: Causes all the traffic lights on the level to be red for 10 seconds, causing traffic snarls and delays.
  • Quarantine: Drivers of the vans on the level are placed in Quarantine, and are unable to drive for 10 seconds

This game was created in 1 month, so expect it to not be perfect. Look out for an updated, polished version coming in 2022. I'd love to hear your suggestions for how to make the game better -- leave a message and I'll take a look!
